title: Traptrix Arachnocampa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Hang above a player, suffocating them if they do not take an action tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Suffocated players die within two nights.
-Suffocated players actions dont do anything if they do choose to take it.
-If a suffocated player takes an action that would visit another player, or are visited by at least two friendly town, they are no longer suffocated.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay everybody who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3277
*Whatever you do, watch your step, and make sure to keep looking up.*
